title: problem patching 6.21..unspecified error occures please check the logs for more information!
body: i m trying to play league  from the release of this 6.21patch...i ve uninstalled lol and reinstalled it and took all these guides u ve posted with network e.t.c and nothing worked... somebody help me why is this even happening..ffff

replies.body: Yeah i'm getting this same thing on patch 6.21 :( it go's to 33% then it loads alittle then BAME "unspecified error occures please check the logs for more information! this is the first time this has ever happen to me so i really need help on this!
The cause of this error varies depending on when you're getting it.  Let me know what % during the process you're receiving the error, and I'll be happy to help!

i tried download it from safe mode witn internet connection...it workes i logged in the game the patch seemed right but the very moment that we seelcted champions and were about to get to the loading screen!!! BOOM the game has crtashed 
nothing that can do about it...3 games in a row i was afk for that ... it crashes what can i do ??
I'm getting same thing, it says at 33% but it's also starting at 33% after 1 file scanned...
